API_Description: Allows the user to set the glyph style of a check box or radio button. The glyph style is the graphic used to indicate that the item has been selected. The style values are associated with keywords as follows. Style | Keyword --------------- check | style.ch cross | style.cr diamond | style.di circle | style.ci star | style.st square | style.sq **Fields** `checkbox` , `radiobutton`
